verbs.description: [ARG0: jpmorgan] [V: helps] [ARG1: wall street bounce] [ARGM-TMP: after two - day slide] wall street was set to rebound on friday after the u s stock market worst two days of losses since february helped by bumper results for the country largest bank jpmorgan
